title: Uber’s dirty business model
selftext:
Today (2 Dec) I was at Bangalore airport and booked uber Go. It was 1 hr wait time to get uber go but 10-15 minutes for go sedan and 5 minutes for premium. Uber deliberately pushing customers to change from go to sedan / premium. There support staff standing there asking passengers to upgrade to get taxi early.
The reason for this is uber is loss making in India.
